channel.title: Gaia on Michael Mommert
channel.description: Recent content in Gaia on Michael Mommert

item.title: Asteroid Shape Information from Gaia DR2
item.description: The Gaia mission builds a unique survey of the stars in our Milky Way - but it also observes asteroids that are crossing its field of view. We derive ensemble shape information for different asteroid populations from the first batch of asteroid data from Gaia.
